raw_title: DE ZOYSA – Mrs RUPA RANJANI (nee De Silva)
raw_body: DE ZOYSA – Mrs RUPA RANJANI (nee De Silva). Wife of late Mr Mervin De Zoysa,​ loving mother of Roshan and Lasitha Gunaratne (Royal College),​ mother-in-law of Ruwani Gunaratne and Dr Neluka Weerasooriya (Da Vita UK),​ grandmother of Ramaaya,​ Liyaan,​ Lehaan,​ Kithmini and Anushka. Remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour (Elvitigala Mawatha) from 15th September to 16th September. Cortege leaves Parlour at 4 p.m. Cremation at Borella Crematorium at 4.30 p.m.058972
